headline: Bourdon Spirits Company Acquires Copper & Kings from Constellation Brands
summary: Bourdon Spirits Company, a family-owned spirits company based in Louisville, has announced its acquisition of Copper & Kings American Brandy Company from Constellation Brands. The move marks a key milestone and deepens Bourdon Spirits' investment in the future of American brandy.

content.title: Bourdon Spirits Company Acquires Copper & Kings from Constellation Brands
content.summary: Bourdon Spirits Company, a family-owned spirits company based in Louisville, has announced its acquisition of Copper & Kings American Brandy Company from Constellation Brands. The move marks a key milestone and deepens Bourdon Spirits' investment in the future of American brandy.

headline: Aluminum can maker Ball Corp lifts annual profit forecast buoyed by strong global demand
summary: Ball witnessed a 4.1% rise in global aluminum packaging shipments during the quarter, up from a 2.6% rise in the prior three months.  The company, serving clients like PepsiCo, Coca-Cola and Constellation Brands, increased beverage packaging sales in North and Central America to $1.61 billion, from $1.47 billion last year.  The manufacturer of aluminum cups, bottles and aerosol cans now expects comparable 2025 earnings to grow between 12% and 15%, up from a prior range of 11% to 14% growth.

The manufacturer of aluminum cups, bottles and aerosol cans now expects comparable 2025 earnings to grow between 12% and 15%, up from a prior range of 11% to 14% growth.
